title: [Skin Concept] DunkMaster Illaoi Discussion
body:
Katey may never read this or any skin concept artist, but even if a few people are as passionate for a new illaoi skin, I hope I reach out to them

Illaoi's Attire/Weapon-

Her outfit is obviously a jersey uniform and her weapon is going to be a basketball she dribbles

Passive DOT-

1.) I think this can be left alone, unless they do something snazzy like with darius's basketball hoop on head

Q Concept - 
1. Tentacle with a headband 
2. Rolled up towel (If you don't get it, look up towel-snapping)

W Concept-

1.) Illaoi uses her basketball to dunk with her next attack.

E Concept-

1.) Again Tentacle with a headband
2.) The tentacle towel will be whipped out and make a satisfying smack while grabbing their soul (towel-snapping 100% relevant)

R concept-

1.) Illaoi summons a Basketball goal from Ouroborus and slams her basketball through the net (like darius). 

Example illaoi ultimate w/ the towel snapping idea

http://static4.businessinsider.com/image/5357f06769beddb37cca22b2/towel-whipping-anti-bullying.gif

replies.body: When I saw the gif, I thought the fat kid was your idea of Illioaioa. I hate typing her name btw. Illiaoioaoi

I do love dunkmaster illaoi idea but you can't go wrong with Car Salesman illaoi skin idea Not much change just outfit and her tentacles are those floppy inflated dancing things that are at almost every car dealership ever (or should be) and her backing animation could be her showing off a car. And it could be 1350 skin or 950 instead of another legendary skin (I would love one for illaoi but less chance of that happening)
Marauder, Car Salesmen, Elderwood, Underworld, and Dun Master Ilaoi... she has many great concepts.

I had this skin idea a while ago. Instead of the tentacles still being there, why not trade it for a bunch of basketball poles / backboards just smacking down on people. simply because that would be fucking hilarious. or even just what you said. Just a bunch of locker room towels twisted up
Should be named "Duchess of Dunk" which also opens up room for other thematic touches.
We need a winter skin for illaoi! with christmas trees for tentacles!
For a sec I thought that fat kid was a woman, which made me wonder if this post was inappropriate and ought to be removed. Lol. Not this time Riot. Not those boobs.

YES. I love illaoi and we really need a new illaoi skin. Dunkmaster just fits her style of play so well.

Rito Pls, I beg you give us a new illaoi skin.
